org.eventchain.layout.core

Interface Serializer<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TypeHandler<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanTypeHandler, ByteArrayTypeHandler, ByteTypeHandler, CharacterTypeHandler, DoubleTypeHandler, EnumTypeHandler, FloatTypeHandler, IntegerTypeHandler, ListTypeHandler, LongTypeHandler, OptionalTypeHandler, Serializer, ShortTypeHandler, StringTypeHandler, UnknownTypeHandler, UUIDTypeHandler

    public interface Serializer<T>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> constantSize()
      If type is of a constant size, should return a non-empty Optional containing value size in bytes
      void serialize(T value, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
      Serializes value of type T to a ByteBuffer.
      int size(T value) 

    • Method Detail

      • size

        int size(T value)
        Parameters:
        value - value to be serialized
        Returns:
        serialized value size in bytes

      • constantSize

        default java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> constantSize()
        If type is of a constant size, should return a non-empty Optional containing value size in bytes
        Returns:
        Optional constant size

      • serialize

        void serialize(T value,
               java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Serializes value of type T to a ByteBuffer. ByteBuffer should be of a correct size. The size can be obtained from size(Object)
        Parameters:
        value - value to serialize
        buffer - ByteBuffer
